SELECT M.M_NO, NVL(AC.P_HOLD*100,0)-NVL(ST.P_USE,0) AS T_POINT FROM M M LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT USER_NO,NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS P_HOLD FROM ATT_CHECK GROUP BY USER_NO) AC ON M.M_NO = AC.USER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(OP.QTY * P.POINT) AS P_USE,USER_NO FROM ORD O INNER JOIN ORDER_PROD OP ON O.ORD_NO = OP.ORDER_NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON OP.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO GROUP BY USER_NO) ST ON M.M_NO = ST.USER_NO WHERE M.M_NO = 3
